summary: User encountered "Workflow referenced an unregistered external sink" errors when using OpenTelemetry interceptors with bundled workflow code. The issue was resolved by ensuring proper `sinks` configuration on the Worker, but documentation lacked clear guidance on this requirement.
userImpact: Users integrating OpenTelemetry interceptors encounter noisy error logs that are resolved by proper configuration, but the requirement is not well documented.
rootCause: Missing or disabled `sinks` configuration on the Worker when using OpenTelemetryOutboundInterceptor
proposedFix: Add `sinks` configuration to Worker.create() with `exporter: makeWorkflowExporter(exporter, resource)`
workaround: Enable the `sinks` configuration block when using OpenTelemetry interceptors
resolutionDetails: Issue was user configuration error - missing required sinks configuration. User noted feedback about improving documentation clarity.
keyQuote: it would be useful to make note of them in the readme, or make more explicit note of them in the sample since its easy to miss the need for it
